Which of the following statements is false
answer_1: You can make a website without using HTML
answer_2: You can make a website without using PHP

title: What is WordPress
answer_1: It is a software used to press text
answer_2: It is a text formatting software
answer_3: It is a CMS (Content Management System)

title: Which of the following is true about Javascript
answer_1: It is a server side scripting language
answer_2: It is client side scripting language
right_answer: It is client side scripting language

title: Which of the following is true about PHP
answer_1: It is a server side scripting language
answer_2: It is client side scripting language
right_answer: It is server side scripting language
